name: Spanner change streams to BigQuery
description: Streaming pipeline. Streams change stream records and writes them into BigQuery dataset/s. Note the created pipeline will run on Dataflow Runner V2

parameters.name: spannerProjectId
parameters.label: Spanner Project ID
parameters.helpText: Project to read change streams from. The default for this parameter is the project where the Dataflow pipeline is running.

parameters.name: spannerInstanceId
parameters.label: Spanner Instance ID
parameters.helpText: The Spanner instance for the Spanner table.

parameters.name: spannerDatabaseId
parameters.label: Spanner database ID
parameters.helpText: The Spanner database to read change streams from.

parameters.name: spannerMetadataInstanceId
parameters.label: Spanner metadata instance ID
parameters.helpText: The Spanner instance to use for the change stream metadata table.

parameters.name: spannerMetadataDatabaseId
parameters.label: Spanner metadata database ID
parameters.helpText: The Spanner database to use for the change stream metadata table.

parameters.name: bigQueryDataset
parameters.label: BigQuery dataset
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery dataset for change streams output.

parameters.name: spannerChangeStreamName
parameters.label: Spanner change stream
parameters.helpText: The Spanner change stream to read from.

parameters.name: network
parameters.label: The Cloud VPC network in which the job is run.
parameters.helpText: Network to which workers will be assigned. If empty or unspecified, the service will use the network "default".

parameters.name: subnetwork
parameters.label: The Cloud VPC sub-network in which the job is run.
parameters.helpText: Subnetwork to which workers will be assigned, if desired. Value can be either a complete URL or an abbreviated path. If the subnetwork is located in a Shared VPC network, you must use the complete URL
